fixedOption.explain:
Overall Damage +2%
Fire Damage +20

Atk. Increase +286.0% for every Burned target (Max Stacks: 5)

[Fire Force]
Attacks deliver Fire attacks, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150: Explosion
- 150 to below 250: Infernal Road
- 250 or more: Meteor
- Inflicts 720, 920, or 1,480% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.
- Meteor Burns enemies for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)

Attack Speed +10%
Casting Speed +15%
Fire Resistance +20

Atk. Increase +1549.3%
Overall Damage +15%

[Forbidden Magic Pact]
Forms a forbidden magic pact to lose blood and link magic to life.
- Consumes MP instead of HP when casting skills or when attacked.
- Restores MP by 100% of HP healing amounts.
- Max HP restricted to 99%

Max MP +4,196
Physical/Magical Def. +7,000
MP +348 per min.
